title: Step-by-Step Process Template
description: A reusable template that defines a clear objective, stepwise actions with expected outputs, validation criteria, and notes for edge cases.
prompt:
<promptTemplate>
  <process>
    <objective>
      <!-- Define the main goal of the task -->
      [Insert clear and concise objective here]
    </objective>

    <steps>
      <step number='1'>
        <action>[Describe the first action to perform]</action>
        <expectedOutput>[State the expected result of step 1]</expectedOutput>
      </step>
      <step number='2'>
        <action>[Describe the second action to perform]</action>
        <expectedOutput>[State the expected result of step 2]</expectedOutput>
      </step>
      <step number='3'>
        <action>[Describe the final action to perform]</action>
        <expectedOutput>[State the final expected result]</expectedOutput>
      </step>
    </steps>

    <validation>
      <criteria>
        <!-- Define how success or completion should be verified -->
        [Insert success criteria or acceptance conditions]
      </criteria>
    </validation>

    <notes>
      <!-- Optional: Add special rules, edge cases, or clarifications -->
      [Insert additional considerations if required]
    </notes>
  </process>
</promptTemplate>
